regen.absent_element: ability to add additional roles when creating a user from a template
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow the addition of extra roles to the user record beyond those inherited from the template during the creation process.

regen.absent_element: mechanism for adding additional roles to a user created from a template
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow the addition of extra roles to a user record created from a template, beyond the roles inherited from the template.

regen.absent_element: additional roles can be added after inheriting role-specific settings from the template
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow adding additional roles to a user record created from a template, in addition to the inherited role-specific settings.

label: The user shall be able to add additional roles manually while creating/adding a new user from a user template.
absence: action of adding additional roles when creating from a user template
